audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Demonstrates fundamental change in credit access - 27% more approvals represents new market creation by serving previously excluded borrowers. This is doing new things (expanding addressable market) not just doing things better.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (27%, 620K borrowers, $7.8B loans) with authoritative source (U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau study). Named organization with traceable claims.
audited_claims.notes: Core transformation claim - AI enables serving a fundamentally different customer base

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 16% lower interest rates combined with expanded approval demonstrates value creation through AI-driven risk assessment. This enables new competitive positioning and market dynamics.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (16% below average) from authoritative government source (CFPB study). High credibility.
audited_claims.notes: Supports transformation narrative - better risk pricing enables new market positioning

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Doubling approval rates 'overnight' indicates fundamental shift in business capability and addressable market. This is business model transformation - from serving limited segment to much broader market.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: First-party account from named organization. While 'nearly doubled' is approximate, the dramatic nature and context provide strong evidence of transformation.
audited_claims.notes: Key transformation moment - demonstrates AI enabling fundamentally different business capability

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: This is operational efficiency improvement (5x faster testing), not strategic transformation. Faster model testing is doing the same thing better, not doing new things.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric and technical detail, but describes process optimization rather than business model change.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Tier 1 claim - operational improvement, not transformation

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Reducing training time from days to hours is process optimization, not strategic transformation. This enables faster iteration but doesn't change the fundamental business model.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Clear operational metric but describes efficiency gain, not value creation change.

apqc_functions.name: Develop and manage IT resilience and risk

audited_claims.notes: Tier 1 claim - operational efficiency, not business transformation

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 264% revenue growth with positive net income demonstrates successful business model execution at scale. This validates the transformation from traditional lending model to AI-driven platform.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific financial metrics ($135.44M net income, 264% growth) for named public company. Highly credible.
audited_claims.notes: Financial validation of transformation success - dramatic growth indicates new value creation model

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: Revenue performance indicates ongoing business success but doesn't directly demonstrate transformation. More of a performance metric than transformation evidence.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific financial data ($127.63M vs $124.53M estimate) from public company reporting. High quality evidence.
audited_claims.notes: Performance metric rather than transformation indicator - shows ongoing success but not strategic change

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 7% growth is modest and doesn't indicate transformation. This appears to be routine business performance reporting.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric ($255.42M, 7% growth) from credible source but represents normal business performance.
audited_claims.notes: Routine performance metric - doesn't demonstrate transformation

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 31% increase in loan transactions with 89K new borrowers demonstrates continued market expansion enabled by AI model. Shows ongoing transformation impact in serving broader market.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metrics (31% increase, 144K loans, 89K new borrowers) from public company reporting. High quality evidence.
audited_claims.notes: Demonstrates ongoing transformation impact - continued expansion of addressable market

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 91% full automation represents fundamental change in service delivery model. This is transformation from human-mediated to AI-driven process, enabling different economics and scale.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (91%) with clear definition (no documents, calls, or human involvement). Public company disclosure.
audited_claims.notes: Core transformation evidence - AI enables fundamentally different service delivery model

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: $40B in loans to 3M consumers over ten years demonstrates scale of transformation impact. This validates the creation of a new lending model serving previously underserved market.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific cumulative metrics ($40B, 3M consumers, 10 years) from first-party source. Demonstrates sustained transformation at scale.
audited_claims.notes: Scale validation of transformation - demonstrates sustained new value creation model

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 3-6x better risk separation is fundamental improvement in core lending capability, enabling different business model with expanded market access and better pricing.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific range (3-6x) from first-party source. While broad range, the magnitude indicates significant capability advancement.
audited_claims.notes: Core capability transformation - dramatically better risk assessment enables new business model

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 90% processing without human intervention represents fundamental change in service delivery model and operational structure. This enables different economics and scale.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (90%) with clear operational definition from first-party source. High credibility.
audited_claims.notes: Operational transformation evidence - AI enables fundamentally different service delivery model

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 101% more approvals (essentially doubling) represents fundamental expansion of addressable market. This is creating new market access, not just optimizing existing processes.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (101% more approvals) from first-party source. Clear quantification of transformation impact.
audited_claims.notes: Market expansion transformation - AI enables serving fundamentally broader customer base

audited_claims.strategic_fit_assessment: 38% lower APRs combined with expanded approvals demonstrates value creation through superior risk assessment. This enables new competitive positioning and market dynamics.
audited_claims.evidence_quality_assessment: Specific metric (38% lower APRs) from first-party source, consistent with other pricing claims.
audited_claims.notes: Pricing transformation - AI enables better risk pricing while expanding market access

tier_verification: Correctly classified as tier 1. Upstart demonstrates genuine business model transformation from traditional credit scoring to AI-driven lending platform, creating new market access for previously excluded borrowers while maintaining profitability. The 'remove the AI' test confirms transformation - without AI models, Upstart's expanded approval capability and risk assessment advantage disappear entirely.
